info.title: Acesse SUS API Documantation
info.description: In this documantation you will be able to consult the API end-points and also test all availblw routes. Do not dorfet to register and carry out the authorization.

post.description: this route is responsible for registering a new root user. As the intention of the API is to leave few users with this power, this route is being protected by changing the role that comes from the request body
this route is responsible for loging in a user of type root
this route can only be accessed by a root user, it will be responsible for creating a health agent

value.name: agent name
value.posto: nome do posto que o agente trabalha

get.description: this route gives you access to all health agents registered in the database
this route gives you access to a specific health agent registered in the database

patch.description: this route allows a root to change the specific health agent data registered in the database

delete.description: this route allows a root to delete the specific health agent data registered in the database

post.description: this route allows you to be able to upload a PNG image to cloudinary
this route allows you to be able to upload a PNG image to cloudinary
this route allows any user, except root, to receive a new one in his email
this route allows the patient to login

get.description: this route allows the patient to have access to their information registered in the database

post.description: this route is responsible for loging in a user of type MED
this route allows the doctor to create a new query in the database or update the previous query causing the previous query to be added to the 'history' field of the 'queries' collection

properties.info: information from the patient about the consultation

get.description: this route allows the doctors to have access to their information registered in the database
this route gives doctors access to a specific patient registered in the database by cpf of patient

post.description: this route is responsible for loging in a user of type AGS
this route can only be accessed by a Health_Agent user, it will be responsible for creating a MED
this route can only be accessed by a Health_Agent user, it will be responsible for creating a pac

get.description: this route allows the ags to have access to their information registered in the database
this route gives you access to all doctors registered in the database
this route gives you access to a specific doctor registered in the database
this route gives you access to all patient registered in the database
this route gives you access to a specific patient registered in the database

patch.description: this route allows a ags to change the specific doctor data registered in the database
this route allows a ags to change the specific patient data registered in the database

delete.description: this route allows a AGS to delete the specific doctor data registered in the database
this route allows a AGS to delete the specific patient data registered in the database
